name: Ratfolk Growth
summary: You call upon the familial bonds you share with other ysoki to defend them in battle.
description:
You call upon the familial bonds you share with other ysoki to defend them in battle. You can cast enlarge as a 6th-level primal innate spell once per day. You can target only yourself and other ratfolk with this spell.Traits

Ratfolk: A creature with this trait is a member of the ratfolk ancestry. Ratfolk are humanoids who resemble rats. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by ratfolk.
